title: OCE Championship Season - League of Legends

embed.description: OCE Championship Season - League of Legends. 6 likes Â· 7 talking about this. Seeing as there are not many on going League of Legends Tournaments/Seasons in OCE, I've decided to create a year round...

body:
This is a 32 week long league of legends event/league that will begin on March the 3rd! It will consist of 6 different divisions tangled into series! With 16 teams per division, spots are limited! Each team will face the opposing teams twice before the top 8 battle it out in the final stage of the series! There are no entry fees or any cost to enter so do not be afraid to give it a go! Divisions will be based off either your teams highest ranked player or on your teams average mmr. There will be more information as time goes on, which will be found on Facebook, twitter and even Instagram! To register head to the Facebook page and leave a message in regards to registering a team and I will be sure to get back to you as soon as possible!

Good luck Summoners and see you on the rift!
